title: Linux bg Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the Linux bg command, learn how to suspend and move foreground processes to the background, and manage background processes effectively.

meta.title: Linux bg Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the Linux bg command, learn how to suspend and move foreground processes to the background, and manage background processes effectively.
meta.keywords: Linux, bg command, process management, background processes, suspend, foreground, practical examples

steps.title: Understand the Purpose and Syntax of the bg Command

verify.name: Verify the bg command usage
verify.hint: Make sure the suspended 'sleep 60' process is running in the background after using the 'bg' command.

steps.title: Suspend a Foreground Process and Move it to the Background

verify.name: Verify the process is in the background
verify.hint: Make sure the 'sleep 120' process is running in the background after using the 'bg' command.

verify.name: Verify the background processes
verify.hint: Make sure there are three background processes running (sleep 60, sleep 120, and sleep 180).
